definition: to come from (a place)/From: (in email header)
autonomous region, namely: Inner Mongolia 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区, Guangxi 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区, Tibet 西藏自治區|西藏自治区, Ningxia 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区, Xinjiang 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区

sentences.english: Melva kisses another guy in front of her boyfriend justifying it to herself as an eye for an eye.
sentences.chinese: 梅尔瓦在男友面前亲吻另一个男孩，自以为报复。

sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the United States after the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 美国的奴隶制度自南北战争后就废除了。

sentences.english: All participants must arrange their own personal accident insurance.
sentences.chinese: 參加者必需自行购买意外保险。

sentences.english: A small bird will drop frozen dead from a bough without ever having felt sorry for itself.
sentences.chinese: 一只小鸟将自枝头冻毙跌下来他未曾为自己感到可怜。
褪尽红尘万物，自混沌中走来。

sentences.english: However, since her return, Chapman has become something of a national hero.
sentences.chinese: 但是，自查普曼归国后，她几乎已是民族英雄。

sentences.english: The adaptive law using stability theory is derived.
sentences.chinese: 按李雅普诺夫稳定性理论设计自适应控制器。

sentences.english: Aloft in the air, as if from the depths of the cloud, came a confused and doubtful sound of voices.
sentences.chinese: 高空中，仿佛自云团深处，传来一片可疑的嘈杂人声。

sentences.english: When you're the guest, you should just make yourself at home.
sentences.chinese: 你若是客人，只需使本人感到自正在就好了。

sentences.english: Since 2003, the Tourism-based Country Strategy has been established and implemented in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 自2003年以来，日本确立并实施了观光立国战略。

sentences.english: A new scheme used in single-phase adaptive reclosure is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种单相自适应重合闸的新方案。

sentences.english: They traveled through the country from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 他们自东向西在这个国家旅行。

sentences.english: Then adaptive NNs (Neural Networks) are introduced for their structure and approximation ability.
sentences.chinese: 接着对自适应神经网络及其逼近特性加以介绍。

sentences.english: The performance of the adaptive algorithm can directly affect the effect of the echo canceller.
sentences.chinese: 自适应算法的性能直接影响着回波消除器的效果。

sentences.english: I haven’t met Wang Ying since last year.
sentences.chinese: 自去年以来我就未遇见过王英。

sentences.english: Dead-zone operator is adopted in the adaptive algorithm, which improves the robustness of the algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 自适应算法中采用了死区算子，增强了算法的鲁棒性。

definition: to reform oneself/to mend one's ways and start life anew

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
